name: FreedomButtons
0:
”Alexa, ask freedom buttons to replay his poem”
”Alexa, ask freedom buttons to recite the remark free at last”
”Alexa, ask freedom buttons to commemorate dr martin luther king jr day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: freedom buttons
des:
Freedom Buttons brightens Alexa with Dr. Martin Luther King's poetic 'I Have a Dream.' While playing his historical poem, Alexa lights up your echo buttons with special colors. Like candles. 

Freedom Buttons can replay several poetic remarks. To listen to his brief 'Let freedom ring' remark, say 'Alexa, ask freedom buttons to recite the remark let freedom ring.'
 
Also try:
 'Let freedom ring'
 'Free at last'
 'We cannot walk alone'
 'Whirlwinds of revolt'
 'Now is the time'
 'Justice for all'
 'I have a dream'

An Echo Button can light up when it is awake. Tap each echo button once to light them up. At the beginning of replay, candles will glow. The candles will burn for ten minutes, uninterrupted. You may keep the candles glowing during the entire sixteen-minutes. Tap each button once after seven or eight minutes. When replay completes, say 'Alexa, ask freedom buttons to stop' to extinguish the candles.

To listen to the Reverend's remarks in entirety, say 
'Alexa, open freedom buttons'
'Alexa, ask freedom buttons to replay his poem'
'Alexa, ask freedom buttons to commemorate dr martin luther king jr day' 
'Alexa, ask freedom buttons to peacefully march'
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
